MAX_TOUNGE.comment:
For 'char_player_data'
#2 has been used!!!!  Don't try using the last of the 3, because it is
the keeper of active/inactive status for dead characters for resurrection!
Used in CHAR_FILE_U *DO*NOT*CHANGE*

MAX_NEW_LANGUAGES.comment: for new languages DO NOT CHANGE!

MAX_SAVES.comment: number of saving throws types... DO NOT CHANGE

MAX_CONDITIONS.comment:
Predifined  conditions
USER FILE, DO NOT CHANGE

SKILL_SPECIALIZED.comment:
need to make byte flags, to long or int flags in char_skill_data
end
skill_data special

AFF_GROWTH.comment: this was the one that was missing

ACT_SPEC.comment: special routine to be called if exist

ACT_SENTINEL.comment: this mobile not to be moved

ACT_ISNPC.comment: This bit is set for use with IS_NPC()

ACT_NICE_THIEF.comment: Set if a thief should NOT be killed

ACT_AGGRESSIVE.comment: Set if automatic attack on NPC's

ACT_STAY_ZONE.comment: MOB Must stay inside its own zone

ACT_WIMPY.comment: MOB Will flee when injured  and if aggressive only attack sleeping players

ACT_ANNOYING.comment: MOB is so utterly irritating that other monsters will attack it...

ACT_HATEFUL.comment: MOB will attack a PC or NPC matching a  specified name

ACT_AFRAID.comment: MOB is afraid of a certain PC or NPC   and will always run away ....

ACT_IMMORTAL.comment: MOB is a natural event  can't be kiled

ACT_HUGE.comment: MOB is too large to go indoors

ACT_SCRIPT.comment: MOB has a script assigned to it DO NOT SET

PLR_WIMPY.comment: character will flee when seriously injured

PLR_NOHASSLE.comment: char won't be attacked by aggressives.

PLR_STEALTH.comment: char won't be announced in a variety of situations

PLR_HUNTING.comment: the player is hunting someone  do a track each look

PLR_DEAF.comment: The player does not hear shouts

PLR_NOSHOUT.comment: the player is not allowed to shout

PLR_FREEZE.comment: The player is frozen  must have pissed an immo off

PLR_NOTELL.comment: The player does not hear tells

SAVE_ROOM.comment: room will save eq and load at reboot

SKILL_KNOWN_BARBARIAN.comment: need to make byte flags, to long or int flags in char_skill_data

SKILL_KNOWN_RANGER.comment: need to make byte flags, to long or int flags in char_skill_data

modes of connectedness

CON_ACCOUNT_TOON.comment: Account password ok, propongo lista personaggi

CON_PWDOK.comment: Tutto pronto, lo riconnetto o mando al menu

NO_DELETE.comment: do not delete me  well until 6 months pass!

RACE_WAR.comment: if enabled they can be hit by opposing race

SHOW_CLASSES.comment: If enabled the PG classes are shown in the WHO

CAN_OBJ_EDIT.comment: this user can use oedit to edit objects

CAN_MOB_EDIT.comment: this user can use medit to edit mobs

e_sys_flags.comment: system flags defined on the fly and by wizards for this boot

SYS_NOKILL.comment: NO PC (good side or bad side) can fight

SYS_LOGALL.comment: log ALL users to the system log

SYS_ECLIPS.comment: the world is in constant darkness!

SYS_SKIPDNS.comment: skips DNS name searches on connects

SYS_REQAPPROVE.comment: force god approval for new char

SYS_LOGMOB.comment: log ALL mob ti system log

FOUND_FOOD.comment: obj that is found if they made it!

ITEM_BRITTLE.comment: weapons that break after 1 hit  armor that breaks when hit?

ITEM_ANTI_SUN.comment: item is sensitive to being in the sun
